description:
Trails in the Sky the 3rd is a JRPG from the "Trails of" / "Kiseki" series,
released in 2007 and developed by Nihon Falcom. Embark on an emotional rollercoaster
following Father Kevin Graham and Ries Argent during their journey to escape the
mysterious dimension of Phantasma. It is highly recommended to pick up the first two
games before playing this one, Trails in the Sky FC / SC.

0.0.1-alpha.description:
Add support up to the end of Chapter 1.

This includes 21 chests across Prologue and Chapter 1.

Progression stays the same as vanilla
0.0.1-alpha.title: 0.0.1-alpha: Initial Release

0.0.2-prelease-1r2.description:
# Bugfixes

- Fix camera issue when receiving item after opening a chest
- Easy Paella now actually gives the recipe instead of Mira

# Important Changes

- The way you start the game has been drastically changed

## How to Start a Game (Assuming the game is already generated and hosted)
- Start the client and connect to the server
- Wait for the client to patch the game
- Launch Trails in the Sky 3rd with DX9

**New Changes Start Here**
- You will get transported to the Hermit Garden with no character
- Open the Party Organizer Menu, then exit it with the **Cancel** option
- You will now start receiving your 2 initial characters plus any items you already got
- Open the Cube Warp menu, and teleport back to base
- You will now have full control of your party and can start the game

# QOLs

- Remove a lot of cutscenes to speedup the flow
- You now start with the Monster Notebook
- You now start with the Party Organizer enabled

# Logic Changes

- The Jade Corridor Barriers now require items to remove instead of unlocking characters from Sealing Stone
- The Arseille now requires a special item to access

# New Features/Progression Changes

## Characters Randomization
- You now start the game with 2 random characters instead of Kevin and Ries
- The other 2 characters are items in the pool
- All characters will start at level 90 with the weakest equipment and no quartz
- The equipment and quartz are now part of the item pool instead

## Sealing Stone Changes
- You no longer receive a Sealing Stone when interacting with one
- Sealing Stones now act like a super chest which contain several locations in one:
  - The **Character Unlock** location
  - Locations for the Sealing Stone's character initial equipment
  - Locations for any of the original map unlock (Example: Jade Corridor Barriers)

## Other Changes
- You now start the game with 6 locations for Kevin and Ries' initial equipment due to them starting the game with no quartz
- You now start the game with a bit more Sepith and Mira to compensate for the skipped prologue battles
- The client will now cache your player + seed information and will skip patch installation if that has not changed
0.0.2-prelease-1r2.title: 0.0.2-prelease-1: Add logics and character randomization

0.0.3-alpha.description:
# Setup
Setup has changed, and a new tools need to be downloaded. Please walk through the setup:
https://github.com/Archipelago-Trails-in-the-Sky-the-3rd/Archipelago-Trails-in-the-Sky-the-3rd/blob/main/worlds/tits_the_3rd/docs/setup_en.md

## Bugfixes
- Generation error resulting from itempool shallow copying is fixed.

## How to Start a Game (Assuming the game is already generated and hosted)
- Start the client and connect to the server
- Wait for the client to patch the game
- Launch Trails in the Sky 3rd with DX9
- You will get transported to the Hermit Garden with no character
- Open the Party Organizer Menu, then exit it with the **Cancel** option
- You will now start receiving your 2 initial characters plus any items you already got
- Open the Cube Warp menu, and teleport back to base
- You will now have full control of your party and can start the game

# New Features/Progression Changes

## Chapter 2
- The randomizer now goes up until the end of Chapter 2.
- Day and night Grancel (south/north/east/west/port) are all different areas which each need to be unlocked separately. 
- Grand arena can only be accessed by Night Grancel East.
- Castle can only be accessed by Night Grancel North.
- Day/Night Grancel chests areseperate locations.

## Craft Randomizer
- Crafts can now be shuffled.
- You may enable craft_shuffle, which means character crafts will be mixed amongst each other (e.g. Kevin can have Ries' craft, etc.)
- You may enable craft_randomizer, which shuffles the craft unlock locations into the item pool (reaching the craft unlock level will unlock a random item).
0.0.3-alpha.title: 0.1.0 (alpha release): Add Chapter 2, Craft Rando

0.1.1.description:
Fix the following issues:

- Fix client not being able to create game mod with craft shuffle off
- Fix errors related to non Sky 3rd items
- Fix craft generation when there are multiple games
- Fix craft learn message sometimes display no craft name

0.1.2.description:
Patch notes:
- Fix issue where upgraded crafts were not getting added to t_magic, resulting in them being broken.
0.1.2.title: 0.1.2 (alpha release): Fix broken upgradable crafts

0.1.3.description:
- Fix issue with Day Grancel Port chests being invisible
- Fix client issue when aliases are used
0.1.3.title: 0.1.3 - More bugfixes

0.1.4.description:
- Fix more Unicode issue
- Client will now print out the error if any
0.1.4.title: 0.1.4 - Even more bugfixes

0.1.5.description:
**This is not compatible with any previous release**

- Fix generation with spoiler option
- Fix some items having the wrong ID
- Some text and typo fixes
0.1.5.title: 0.1.5 - Maintenance Patch

0.1.6.description:
**Please Generate Template Options again for new YAML**

## New Feature
- Chapter select goal (can be beating chapter 1 boss or chapter 2 boss)

## Bugfixes
- Finally fix 2 more items than locations bug
- Fix some more typos
- Fix some generation issues

Any further issue will be fixed in chapter 3 release unless it's critical.
0.1.6.title: 0.1.6 - Final Chapter 2 Bugfix Release
